components.name: Streamlit Application
components.description: The frontend application built using Streamlit that interacts with users and displays the UI.

components.name: Authentication Controller
components.description: Handles user authentication processes, including login, logout, and session management.

components.name: Cookie Controller
components.description: Manages the creation and validation of authentication cookies for session persistence.

components.name: OAuth2 Models
components.description: Handles OAuth2 authentication flows for third-party services like Google and Microsoft.

components.name: Configuration File
components.description: Stores user credentials and application settings in a YAML format for easy management.

data_flows.description: User credentials are sent from the Streamlit application to the Authentication Controller for verification.
Upon successful authentication, the Authentication Controller instructs the Cookie Controller to create a session cookie.
The application redirects users to OAuth2 providers for authentication and receives tokens upon success.

trust_boundaries.name: User Data Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary separating user data management from the application logic.

trust_boundaries.name: Session Management Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary that protects session management processes and cookie handling.
